Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss how this product can best serve your needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
